__e: You think my father is the root of all problems.
Now that you are a part of all this, a part of us it is the root of your life.
Money is the root of all of our problems, And I want out.
You have of late stood out against your brother, and he hath ta'en you newly into his grace, where it is impossible you should take root by the fair weather that you make yourself.
You became my wife on paper, and then it took root in your heart.
I want to see Mr. Racine after the final bell.
And he came in, and he was very quiet, and he came up to me, and he kissed me on that area between my uh... my um... forehead and the bridge of my nose.
That night, you killed the root of the evil in me, but I still have a long way to go.
But I still think she should continue to see me, you know, get to the real root of the problem.
